full_description:
Imilab Imiki D2 1.43" AMOLED Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch

The Imilab Imiki D2 1.43" AMOLED Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch combines elegance, practicality, and tough durability. This smartwatch has a brilliant 1.43" Super Retina AMOLED display that produces spectacular graphics with rich colors and fine clarity. Its silicone strap provides a comfortable fit for all-day usage, and Bangla language compatibility appeals to a broader audience, making conversations more accessible. The Imiki D2 is a robust smartwatch that can keep up with your busy lifestyle. Bluetooth calling allows you to make and receive calls right from your wrist, keeping you connected wherever you go. Use the built-in voice assistant for hands-free convenience, whether you're setting reminders, checking the weather, or controlling smart home devices. For fitness fanatics, the Imiki D2 has an excellent feature set, including 100 sports modes for precise workout tracking. Whether you're jogging, cycling, or performing yoga, this wristwatch delivers extensive information on your performance and progression. The Imiki live app allows you to easily sync your data and track your health and fitness objectives. Waterproof up to 3ATM, the Imiki D2 is ideal for swimming and other water activities, allowing you to track your workouts even when wet. Plus, with a battery life of up to 10 days under moderate use, you can stay connected and busy without having to continuously recharge. With over 100 watch faces to pick from, you can tailor your Imiki D2 to your taste and mood, ensuring that it always represents your individuality. Whether you're working out or going about your everyday routine, the Imilab Imiki D2 wristwatch is the perfect companion for remaining connected, motivated, and beautiful.

Super-Retina AMOLED Display

The Imiki D2 has an AMOLED screen that rivals the top displays in the world. The display's 326 ppi pixel density creates a crisp, colorful, and lifelike image with smooth reading.

Comprehensive Health Protection

The Imiki D2 provides accurate and efficient access to important health data. The Imiki D2 watch's biometric sensor tracks various health variables simultaneously and optimizes the usage of optical light.

3ATM Waterproof Rating

The Imiki D2 smart watch has professional waterproofing up to 30 meters, making it comparable to high-end timepieces and suitable for daily usage or swimming.

Lasts Up to 30 Days

The Imiki D2 has exceptional battery life due to its electrical component selection and power optimization technologies. The watch has a battery life of 10 days with typical usage and up to 4 days without Bluetooth. Heavy usage can last up to 4 days, while Battery Saver Modes provide up to 30 days of backup.

Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at lowest price. The Imilab Imiki D2 1.43" AMOLED Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch comes with 1 year brand warranty.

full_description:
IMILAB W01 Fitness Smart Watch

IMILAB W01 Fitness Smart Watch is the latest release from IMILAB. This newest IMILAB W01 Smart Watch is a unique fitness smartwatch that supports 70+ sports modes with a big and bright 1.69-inch Full-Touch Square Screen. The screen has a True Color Display. It offers a larger display area than a round watch face of the same width to accommodate more information. With precise heart rate monitoring, the IMILAB W01 smartwatch allows you to accurately track real-time steps taken, all-day heart rate monitoring, distance traveled, calories burned, quality of sleep, and sleeping patterns. it also has a real-time SpO2 Monitor. Inside the slim body, the 220mAh built-in battery provides sufficient power for about 15 days and enables you to avoid frequent charging. With the technology of 3ATM water resistance, the W01 smartwatch will not be damaged even if you wash your hands, bathe and swim while wearing the fitness watch. Perfect to meet your daily needs. The other features of the IMILAB W01 Smartwatch include 24h Bio Tracker, 24h Heart Rate Monitoring, Call and Message Notifications, Sleep Tracker, and Alarm Clock. This smartwatch also has some Female Caring features like a menstrual cycle alert. This 38g Lightweight watch features Customizable Dials and Stylish Straps. IMILAB W01 Fitness Smart Watch comes with a 06-month Warranty.

full_description:
IMILAB W12 Smart Watch

The IMILAB W12 Smart Watch is a gadget that will help in everyday life. It is one of the versatile smartwatches that offers a cool and fetish design with a tinner, lightweight form factor. You can easily change the dials to suit your mood and style. It comes with a 1.32-inches 3D HD TFT screen that really stands out in the crowd. It has the universal 360 x 360 pixels display resolution that we can find in some other smartwatches. It has a 10.8mm thinner Zinc alloy metal case that feels rugged for daily usage. It has 260mm x 22mm x 11mm of the form factor that weighs 57 grams. IMILAB W12 has a built-in 340 mAh battery, which means that you can use it for a long time without recharging. The watch will also help monitor your health. Whatever you do during the day, IMILAB W12 will always monitor your wellness and track even small deviations from the norm. The watch can control your heart condition around the clock and thus help monitor your cardiovascular system. Besides, IMILAB W12 is waterproof so no need to worry about the state of the watch when it comes into contact with water. It has no warranty.

full_description:
Imilab Imiki TG2 1.43" AMOLED Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch with Magnetic Strap

The Imilab Imiki TG2 1.43" AMOLED Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch is a brilliant combination of design, practicality, and cutting-edge technology. The Imiki TG2 is made with precision from fine metal components, exuding durability and elegance, and the magnetic strap offers a secure and comfortable fit for all-day usage. With a width of 22mm and an unfolded length of 255mm, the strap is intended to fit a wide variety of wrist sizes, ensuring a personalized and ergonomic experience for each user. The TG2's sleek black hue elevates any ensemble, making it a great accessory for every occasion. The Imiki TG2 has an IP68 water resistant rating and is designed to endure the elements, from sweat and rain to splashes and accidental submersion, so you can wear it with confidence during workouts or outdoor activities. The circular 1.43" AMOLED display provides outstanding graphics with a resolution of 466x466 pixels, delivering clear and colorful images that improve your viewing experience. With cloud-based watch faces available, you can quickly change the look of your wristwatch to fit your style and mood, with a diverse range of styles to pick from. The Imiki TG2's high-capacity 280mAh battery provides exceptional battery life, with up to 30 days of standby time in an unlinked state and around 7 days of daily usage in Bluetooth Call Mode. Charging is simple and effective, with the magnetic charging method allowing for rapid and hassle-free charging in as little as 45 minutes, ensuring that your smartwatch is always ready to go. The Imiki TG2 has modern sensors such as blood oxygen and PPG heart rate monitors, which provide useful information about your health and fitness. With Bluetooth v5.2 connection, this wristwatch pairs seamlessly with your compatible devices, allowing you to stay connected and in control wherever you go. The Imiki TG2 is compatible with Android 4.4 and higher and iOS 8.0 and higher, and it easily fits into your daily routine, allowing easy access to calls, texts, alerts, and health data, keeping you connected and informed at all times.
